author: mm.999
content:
Two attempts were done to load the remaining keys through lighthouse vc API (to avoid shutting down lighthouse vc, which would be the traditional process). In both cases initially the keys loading was (slowly) working until it somehow interfered with the normal lighthouse operation. So the keys loading process got purposely aborted and lighthouse vc resumed its normal operation (so that blocks and attestations got back being timely signed and published). 
So far erigon didnâ€™t contribute to the above troubles, it was a suffering party.
Weâ€™ll be monitoring how things go on.

author: parithosh
content: Which client devs are looking into attestation performance on Hoodi? afaik that was one of the concerns for pectra. And is there something we can do to help?

author: potuz
content: Yeah roll back all the attestations EIPs

author: parithosh
content:
There's a thread here on model based testing for the CLs: https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/1323326526070063204

Its at a stage where the tests *should* be ready and consumable by the CLs. I know its probably hard to allocate time on all CL teams for this right now, but maybe one or two have a devops person or someone outside of the critical path that can help? 

The idea is to integrate it in the CI of client teams, get some insight on how helpful it is, potentially find bugs, etc.

author: somnergy
content:
<@&595683849225240704> Our validator running erigon <> lighthouse cannot attest or send blocks in time, plagued with
```
Mar 28 15:19:43.236 ERRO Failure verifying sync committee signature for gossip, validator_index: 660974, slot: 80147, request_index: 5, error: PastSlot { message_slot: Slot(80147), earliest_permissible_slot: Slot(80148) }
```
Even after updating to beta5 and re-syncing. Running 37K keys on one instance, has been very intermittent.
